These Considerations have prevailed with me to offer my Thoughts in this Manner, and that a prejudic'd Notion of Self-Interest may have no Room to be objected to my Design, which, in this Shape, must evidently appear to be calculated for the Benefit of my Fellow-Subjects of Great-Britain.
